verifyProof(uint256[2],uint256[2][2],uin.details: This function checks the validity of the provided proof parameters.

params.pubSignals: The public signals associated with the proof.

returns.isValid: A boolean value indicating whether the provided proof is valid (true) or not (false).

verifyProof(uint256[2],uint256[2][2],uin.notice: Verifies a given register circuit proof.
